subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Against the Rockies, Casey McGehee hit a two-run single for the Marlins, who have scored 27 runs in four games after taking 14 games to do the same last year.
snippet: Against the Rockies, Casey McGehee hit a two-run single for the Marlins, who have scored 27 runs in four games after taking 14 games to do the same last year.
